name: Hot Hot Robot Hearts
description:
It’s the future and robots have feelings!

There’s an imbalance of robot brains to hearts on the market and it’s causing all sorts of problems between robots and humanity. Cold, hard logic has its place, but the world needs more love!

As the manager of the last robot heart factory, your ability to produce and sell as many hearts as fast as possible could make the difference between peace and turmoil for robots and humans.

Controls

Click on the Heart Machine to make hearts! Get your robots moving quickly by clicking on the Motivation button! Place equipment that boosts the speed at which your Heart Machines produce hearts and how much those hearts are worth!

W / A / S / D - Forward / Left / Backward / Right
Scroll Wheel - Zoom In / Out
Hold Right Mouse Button - Rotate View
Space Bar - Cancel Build/Pick Up/Sell Machine
M - Show Menu
